description: The Men's Drop Line Vest will be your new warm companion to check off all your chilly weather to-dos. This lightweight fleece vest keeps your core warm and your arms free to face the daunting backyard tasks of fall leaf raking and firewood chopping. Layer the Drop Line Vest under a shell or throw it over a long-sleeve tee and hit the trail or the crag for ultimate flexible outdoor freedom. Headed out on the town? Throw on your vest for a casual or classy night out without sacrificing warmth.
name: Marmot Drop Line Vest - Mens
